abilities.name: Lonesome
abilities.effect: As long as you have less Pokémon in play than your opponent, your opponent can't play any Trainer cards (except for Supporter cards) from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Tight Jaw
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Houndoom.
